mapper.sql: trade_account_id, profit_loss, available_fund, frozen_fund, fee, total_fund, create_time, update_time, operator_id
mapper.select:
SELECT atae.trade_account_id, atae.profit_loss, atae.available_fund, atae.frozen_fund, atae.fee, atae.total_fund, atae.create_time,atae.update_time, atae.operator_id,at.trade_account_id, at.company_id, at.trade_account_type, at.trade_account, at.trade_account_name,at.trade_account_password, at.broker_id, at.trade_account_status, at.create_time,at.update_time,at.operator_id,at.is_login FROM ams_trade_account_ext atae join ams_trade_account at on atae.trade_account_id = at.trade_account_id where 1 = 1
limit ${offset}, ${limit} limit ${limit}
mapper.insert:
insert into ams_trade_account_ext
trade_account_id,
profit_loss,
available_fund,
frozen_fund,
fee,
total_fund,
create_time,
update_time,
operator_id,
#{tradeAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{profitLoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{availableFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{frozenFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update ams_trade_account_ext
profit_loss = #{profitLoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
available_fund = #{availableFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
frozen_fund = #{frozenFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_fund = #{totalFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where trade_account_id = #{tradeAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ams_trade_account_ext set profit_loss = #{profitLoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available_fund = #{availableFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen_fund = #{frozenFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_fund = #{totalFund,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where trade_account_id = #{tradeAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ams_trade_account_ext_snaps SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S%f')/1000 AS UNSIGNED),tb.* from ams_trade_account_ext as tb where trade_account_id= #{trade_account_id}
